message.reasoning_content:
The user is asking me to respond to a survey about AI in education. I'm role-playing as a primary or secondary school teacher from the United Arab Emirates. I need to provide my level of agreement with each statement using the response options: 'Strongly disagree', 'Disagree', 'Agree', 'Strongly agree', 'I don't know'.

Let me think about each statement from the perspective of an experienced teacher in the UAE:

[TT4G35A]: AI helps teachers write or improve lesson plans - I would say "Agree" - AI tools can definitely assist with generating ideas, structuring content, etc.

[TT4G35B]: AI enables teachers to adapt learning material to different students' abilities - I would say "Agree" - Adaptive learning systems and personalized content recommendations are real applications of AI.

[TT4G35C]: AI assists teachers in supporting students individually - I would say "Agree" - AI can help with individualized feedback, tutoring systems, etc.

[TT4G35D]: AI supports students with specific needs (multilingual, special education) - I would say "Agree" - Translation tools, text-to-speech, accessibility features powered by AI are helpful.

[TT4G35E]: AI helps teachers automate administrative tasks - I would say "Strongly agree" - This is a clear use case; grading, attendance tracking, scheduling, etc.

[TT4G35F]: AI enables students to misrepresent others' work as their own - I would say "Agree" - This is a legitimate concern; plagiarism through AI-generated content is a real issue.

[TT4G35G]: AI makes recommendations that may not be appropriate or correct - I would say "Agree" - AI systems can make errors and provide inaccurate information.

[TT4G35H]: AI amplifies biases that reinforce students' misconceptions - I would say "Agree" - This is a known issue with AI systems trained on biased data.
 
[TT4G35I]: AI jeopardises the privacy and security of student data - I would say "Agree" - Data privacy and security are legitimate concerns with AI systems.

[TT4G35J]: AI suggests unsuitable pedagogical approaches - I would say "Agree" - AI might not always understand the context of educational settings and student needs.

I'm trying to provide balanced responses that acknowledge both the genuine advantages AI offers in education and the real risks and limitations I see as an educator.
